thread.title: Danny Dyer’s daughter in threat to woman who claims EastEnders hardman sent pictures of his penis
thread.title_full: Danny Dyer’s daughter in threat to woman who claims EastEnders hardman sent pictures of his penis

author: ttowers
title: Danny Dyer’s daughter in threat to woman who claims EastEnders hardman sent pictures of his penis
text:
Dyer sent the messages to the fan just weeks before he married his childhood sweetheart Joanne Mas PA Wire He has been in a relationship with Joanne since the pair were teenagers 
Wannabe actress Dani found the fan, who is in her 30s, on social media. 
She sent her a direct message asking: “What you think you are some sort of a f cool person trying to make yourself famous for 5 minutes?” 
She then added: “Slag slag slag that’s what you were made to be now bend over you dirty whore.” 
A close pal of the fan said she had been left “shaken” by the messages. 
The friend added: “She hasn’t responded to the abuse from Dani because she believes that silence is louder than words. Joanne, 40, proposed to 39-year-old Dyer on Valentine’s Day 2015 Getty Images Dyer is currently taking an enforced break from his EastEnders role in a bid to ‘sort his life out’ Former EastEnders star Shaun Williamson defends Danny Dyer 
“Dani sent them to her over Facebook at 8am so it was a horrible thing to read as she was getting her kids ready for school. 
“She was really upset and anxious after receiving them, who wouldn't be? 
“It’s hard for her because she is getting all the abuse and is being slagged off by Danny's daughter. 
She felt like she loved Danny, she was a massive fan and easily fell for all his charm 
“But he is the one in the wrong. 
“She doesn’t understand why she is under fire. 
“She felt like she loved Danny, she was a massive fan and easily fell for all his charm. 
“Danny sent the messages from his official Twitter account, the same one he speaks to his daughter using, so it is obviously him, but still his Dani runs to his defence. It is crazy.” RELATED STORIES sex on the brain Troubled Danny Dyer's EastEnders pals fear the actor could be 'heading down path towards sex addiction' EMERGENCY Danny Dyer once starred in Casualty as a rogue paramedic with a devastating backstory MEET THE MISSUS Danny Dyer is back in the news for a sexting scandal - we take a look at his long-suffering wife Joanne Mas DYER SEXTED ME HIS ENDER Young mum claims womanising Danny Dyer sent her pic of his manhood – and begged her for filthy vids using Cockney rhyming slang just weeks before his wedding ON A BAD RUN Is Whitney Carter leaving EastEnders? What does the future hold for her? NO WONDER HE NEEDS A BREAK! Danny Dyer has had some of EastEnders' most depressing storylines since joining the soap 
Dyer first shared Twitter messages with the fan after she attended a book signing in October 2015. 
The pair later met at a series of events where he made guest appearances – but they did not have a physical sexual relationship. 
However on another occasion he sent the fan a picture of his penis poking out from his boxers. Getty Images Dyer first shared Twitter messages with the fan after she attended a book signing in October 2015 Splash News
